text:
Documentation says mod-imagemap is enabled by default. Running configure and make generate an httpd which when checked with httpd -l shows that the module is NOT enabled.

Running configure -enable-imagemap gives a number of warning messages about unknown option but once completed and make is done the new httpd does now show that the module is enabled.

This is very confusing
creator: rjlanc@gmail.com

text:
Can you paste some of those errors in here, so we can try and decipher them.

Cheers,
Tony
creator: tony@pc-tony.com
rpluem@apache.org
